did.abstract: Accounts of the Melbourne Plantation, in Arkansas, written for Buckner stating annual expenses and proceeds from crops. Includes records pertaining to crops, animals, labor salaries, and equipment repairs. Buckner served as a captain in the 8th Kentucky Regiment, CSA.
